languages.text: "Обет Императора" приветствует славн{mf|ого|ую} правител{mf|я|ьницу} династии фон Валанциус! Эрбрегхт ап Даэфф, Мастер вокса Его Светлости Лорд-капитана Каллигоса Винтерскейла, имеет честь сегодня говорить от имени своего господина".

traits.locale_text: "Обет Императора" приветствует славн{mf|ого|ую} правител{mf|я|ьницу} династии фон Валанциус! Эрбрегхт ап Даэфф, Мастер Вокса Его Светлости Лорд-капитана Каллигоса Винтерскейла, имеет честь сегодня говорить от имени своего господина".

languages.text: "The Emperor's Vow sends its greetings to the glorious ruler of the von Valancius dynasty! This is Erbreght ap Daeff, His Lordship Calligos Winterscale's Vox Master, who has the honour of speaking on behalf of his lord today."
languages.original_text: "Обет Императора" приветствует славн{mf|ого|ую} правител{mf|я|ьницу} династии фон Валанциус! Эрбрегхт ап Даэфф, Мастер вокса Его Светлости Лорд-капитана Каллигоса Винтерскейла, имеет честь сегодня говорить от имени своего господина".

traits.locale_text: "Oath of the Emperor" sends greetings to the glorious ruler of the von Valancius dynasty! It is Erbreght ap Daeff, His Lordship Calligos Winterscale's Vox Master, who has the honour of speaking on behalf of his master today."

"Oath of the Emperor" sends greetings to the glorious ruler of the von Valancius dynasty! It is Erbreght ap Daeff, His Lordship Calligos Winterscale's Vox Master, who has the honour of speaking on behalf of his master today."

Oath of the Emperor sends its greetings to the glorious ruler of the von Valancius dynasty! It is Erbreght ap Daeff, His Lordship Calligos Winterscale's Vox Master, who has the honour of speaking on behalf of his master today."

Oath of the Emperor sends its greetings to the glorious ruler of the von Valancius dynasty! It is Erbreght ap Daeff, His Lordship Calligos Winterscale's Vox Master, who has the honour of speaking on behalf of his master today."

"The Emperor's Vow sends its greetings to the glorious ruler of the von Valancius dynasty! This is Erbreght ap Daeff, His Lordship Calligos Winterscale's Vox Master, who has the honour of speaking on behalf of his lord today."

languages.text: « Le Serment de l'Empereur adresse ses sincères salutations {mf|au glorieux souverain|à la glorieuse souveraine} de la dynastie von Valancius ! Je me présente : Erbreght ap Daeff, maître-vox de Sa Seigneurie Calligos Winterscale, dont j'ai l'honneur de me faire le porte-parole aujourd'hui. »
languages.original_text: "The Emperor's Vow sends its greetings to the glorious ruler of the von Valancius dynasty! This is Erbreght ap Daeff, His Lordship Calligos Winterscale's Vox Master, who has the honour of speaking on behalf of his lord today."

traits.locale_text: « Le Serment de l'Empereur adresse ses sincères salutations {mf|au glorieux souverain|à la glorieuse souveraine} de la dynastie von Valancius ! Je me présente : Erbreght ap Daeff, maître-vox de Sa Seigneurie Calligos Winterscale, dont j'ai l'honneur de me faire le porte-parole aujourd'hui. »

languages.text: “帝皇誓约号向冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的光荣统治者致以问候！今天有幸代表主人发言的是埃尔布雷特·爱普·戴夫，卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔大人的音阵大师。”
languages.original_text: "The Emperor's Vow sends its greetings to the glorious ruler of the von Valancius dynasty! This is Erbreght ap Daeff, His Lordship Calligos Winterscale's Vox Master, who has the honour of speaking on behalf of his lord today."

traits.locale_text: “帝皇誓约号向冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的光荣统治者致以问候！今天有幸代表主人发言的是埃尔布雷特·爱普·戴夫，卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔大人的音阵大师。”

languages.text: "Die Eid des Imperators grüßt {mf|den glorreichen Herrscher|die glorreiche Herrscherin} der Dynastie von Valancius! Hier spricht Erbreght ap Daeff, der Voxmeister seiner Lordschaft Calligos Winterzunder. Ich habe heute die Ehre, im Namen meines Meisters zu sprechen."
languages.original_text: "The Emperor's Vow sends its greetings to the glorious ruler of the von Valancius dynasty! This is Erbreght ap Daeff, His Lordship Calligos Winterscale's Vox Master, who has the honour of speaking on behalf of his lord today."

traits.locale_text: Die Eid des Imperators grüßt {mf|den glorreichen Herrscher|die glorreiche Herrscherin} der Dynastie von Valancius! Hier spricht Erbreght ap Daeff, der Voxmeister seiner Lordschaft Calligos Winterzunder. Ich habe heute die Ehre, im Namen meines Meisters zu sprechen."

Die Eid des Imperators grüßt {mf|den glorreichen Herrscher|die glorreiche Herrscherin} der Dynastie von Valancius! Hier spricht Erbreght ap Daeff, der Voxmeister seiner Lordschaft Calligos Winterzunder. Ich habe heute die Ehre, im Namen meines Meisters zu sprechen."

languages.text: «¡El Voto del Emperador envía saludos a{mf|l| la} ilustre gobernante de la dinastía von Valancius! Le habla Erbreght ap Daeff, maestro de voco de mi señor Calligos Winterscale, a quien se le ha otorgado el honor de hablar en nombre de su señor».
languages.original_text: "The Emperor's Vow sends its greetings to the glorious ruler of the von Valancius dynasty! This is Erbreght ap Daeff, His Lordship Calligos Winterscale's Vox Master, who has the honour of speaking on behalf of his lord today."

traits.locale_text: «¡El Voto del Emperador envía saludos a{mf|l| la} ilustre gobernante de la dinastía von Valancius! Le habla Erbreght ap Daeff, maestro de voco de mi señor Calligos Winterscale, a quien se le ha otorgado el honor de hablar en nombre de su señor».

languages.text: 「『皇帝の誓い』号より、フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝の栄光ある支配者へご挨拶申し上げます！こちらは、カリゴス・ウィンタースケール卿のヴォクス・マスター、エルブレート・アプ・ダエフ。本日、その主君に代わりご挨拶申し上げる栄誉を賜っております」
languages.original_text: "The Emperor's Vow sends its greetings to the glorious ruler of the von Valancius dynasty! This is Erbreght ap Daeff, His Lordship Calligos Winterscale's Vox Master, who has the honour of speaking on behalf of his lord today."

traits.locale_text: 「『皇帝の誓い』号より、フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝の栄光ある支配者へご挨拶申し上げます！こちらは、カリゴス・ウィンタースケール卿のヴォクス・マスター、エルブレート・アプ・ダエフ。本日、その主君に代わりご挨拶申し上げる栄誉を賜っております」

languages.text: "Von Valancius hanedanlığının şanlı hükümdarına İmparator'un Andı'ndan selam olsun! Lord Hazretleri Calligos Winterscale'in Voks Üstadı Erbreght ap Daeff konuşuyor. Lordumu temsilen konuşma şerefine nail olduğumu bildiriyorum."
languages.original_text: "The Emperor's Vow sends its greetings to the glorious ruler of the von Valancius dynasty! This is Erbreght ap Daeff, His Lordship Calligos Winterscale's Vox Master, who has the honour of speaking on behalf of his lord today."
